name: Materialized Tricks
description:
A game made within a (very busy) week for the octobear game jam (no it is not misspelled).

Use the materials given to you to reshape them into new, and perhaps more useful ones, in order to disable traps, form the level item and proceed to the next level.

This game uses royalty free music made by KevinMcleod

"Floating Cities" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

A polished version will hopefully be uploaded in the near future, featuring a proper guide, proper credits, a level selector (if I remember) and many more levels and mechanics, in addition to your suggested ideas! The top commenters will receive the full game for free (or they can ask for a key for a friend, it's up to them).
